code: import React from'react';import CartItem from'./CartItem';import"./style.css";import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Cart=function Cart(_ref){var cart=_ref.cart,onRemoveFromCart=_ref.onRemoveFromCart,onEmptyCart=_ref.onEmptyCart,onUpdateCartQty=_ref.onUpdateCartQty;var handleEmptyCart=function handleEmptyCart(){onEmptyCart();};var renderEmptyMessage=function renderEmptyMessage(){if(cart.total_unique_items>0){return;}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"cart-none",children:"You have no items in your shopping cart, start adding some!"});};var renderItems=function renderItems(){return cart.line_items.map(function(lineItem){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CartItem,{item:lineItem,onUpdateCartQty:onUpdateCartQty,onRemoveFromCart:onRemoveFromCart,className:"cart-inner"},lineItem.id);});};var renderTotal=function renderTotal(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cart-total",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h6",{className:"cart-total-title",children:"Subtotal"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"cart-total-price",children:cart.subtotal.formatted_with_symbol})]});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cart",children:[renderEmptyMessage(),renderItems(),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/cart-view",children:"View Cart"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cart-footer",children:[renderTotal(),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"cart-btn-empty",onClick:handleEmptyCart,children:"Clear Cart"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/checkout",className:"cart-btn-checkout",children:"Checkout"})]})]});};export default Cart;
